DOC.brief_summary: Study determine Efficacy Standardised Bilberry Extract improve night vision evaluate tolerability safety .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Standardised Bilberry Extract Improving Night Vision Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject ( volunteer ) normal twilight night vision Age 18+ , young collaborative men woman Having give write informed consent Full visual acuity ( vision 0.8 better ) accord DIN Standard condition Refraction â‰¤ +/10.0 high main step Normal intraocular pressure ( 1020 mmHg ) Diabetes mellitus Epilepsy Abnormal visual acuity abnormal morphological eye finding Glaucoma macula degeneration Disease retina Consumption anthocyan preparation past six month Opthalmologic pathology : cataract , visus < 0.8 , retinal pathology , maculopathy , intraocular pressure > 21 mmHg , know acute chronic eye disease , use hard contact lenses , eye surgery perform within last 12 month Any serious disorder might interfere his/her participation study evaluation efficacy safety test drug : e.g . diabetes mellitus , anamnestic indication diabetic microangiopathy polyneuropathy , renal insufficiency , hepatic metabolic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease ( hypertension > 160/100 mmHg ) , psychiatric disorder , myasthenia gravis , delirious state , albino Any treatment might interfere evaluation test drug , particular drug know influence eye sight adaptation ( e.g . chloroquine , digitalis , ethambutol , chlorpromazine , benzodiazepine phenothiazine derivative thioridazine , periciazine , perphenazine ) Known hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Drug alcohol abuse Pregnancy , lactation , woman childbearing potential use establish contraceptive Participation another trial within past 30 day
